member.summary: Case-sensitive username of sender of chat message.

member.summary: User type can be viewer, moderator, global mod, admin, or staff

member.name: P:TwitchLib.ChatMessage.Subscriber

member.name: P:TwitchLib.ChatMessage.ModFlag

member.summary: Chat message /me identifier flag.

member.summary: Text after emotes have been handled (if desired). Will be null if replaceEmotes is false.

member.summary: List of key-value pair badges.

member.summary: Constructor for ChatMessage object.

Whether to replace emotes for this chat message. Defaults to false.

member.name: T:TwitchLib.Common
member.summary: A common/utility class for frequently used functions and variables.

member.name: T:TwitchLib.Common.UType
member.summary: Enum representing various user-types.

member.name: F:TwitchLib.Common.UType.Viewer
member.summary: The standard user-type representing a standard viewer.

member.name: F:TwitchLib.Common.UType.Moderator
member.summary: User-type representing viewers with channel-specific moderation powers.

member.name: F:TwitchLib.Common.UType.GlobalModerator
member.summary: User-type representing viewers with Twitch-wide moderation powers.

member.name: F:TwitchLib.Common.UType.Admin
member.summary: User-type representing viewers with Twitch-wide moderation powers that are paid.

member.name: F:TwitchLib.Common.UType.Staff
member.summary: User-type representing viewers that are Twitch employees.

member.name: T:TwitchLib.MessageEmote
member.summary: Class for maintaining emotes that may be substituted into messages.
member.remarks: Also contains helpers to aid in performing actual replacements. Expected to be called from the context of and .

member.name: T:TwitchLib.MessageEmote.ReplaceEmoteDelegate
member.summary: Delegate allowing Emotes to handle their replacement text on a case-by-case basis.
member.returns: The string for the calling emote to be replaced with.

member.name: F:TwitchLib.MessageEmote.TwitchEmoteUrls
member.summary: Collection of Composite Format Strings which will substitute an emote ID to get a URL for an image from the Twitch CDN
member.remarks: These are sorted such that the enum can be used as an index, eg TwitchEmoteUrls[]

member.name: F:TwitchLib.MessageEmote.FrankerFaceZEmoteUrls
member.summary: Collection of Composite Format Strings which will substitute an emote ID to get a URL for an image from the FFZ CDN
member.remarks: These are sorted such that the enum can be used as an index, eg FrankerFaceZEmoteUrls[] WARNING: FrankerFaceZ does not require users to submit all sizes, so using something other than Small images may result in broken links!

member.name: F:TwitchLib.MessageEmote.BetterTwitchTvEmoteUrls
member.summary: Collection of Composite Format Strings which will substitute an emote ID to get a URL for an image from the BTTV CDN
member.remarks: These are sorted such that the enum can be used as an index, eg BetterTwitchTvEmoteUrls[]

member.name: M:TwitchLib.MessageEmote.SourceMatchingReplacementText(TwitchLib.MessageEmote)
member.summary: A delegate which attempts to match the calling with its and pulls the small version of the URL.

member.name: T:TwitchLib.MessageEmote.EmoteSource
member.summary: Enum supplying the supported sites which provide Emote images.

member.name: F:TwitchLib.MessageEmote.EmoteSource.Twitch
member.summary: Emotes hosted by Twitch.tv natively

member.name: F:TwitchLib.MessageEmote.EmoteSource.FrankerFaceZ
member.summary: Emotes hosted by FrankerFaceZ.com

member.name: F:TwitchLib.MessageEmote.EmoteSource.BetterTwitchTv
member.summary: Emotes hosted by BetterTTV.net

member.name: T:TwitchLib.MessageEmote.EmoteSize
member.summary: Enum denoting the emote sizes

member.name: F:TwitchLib.MessageEmote.EmoteSize.Small
member.summary: Best support Small-sized emotes are the standard size used in the Twitch web chat.

member.name: F:TwitchLib.MessageEmote.EmoteSize.Medium
member.summary: Medium-sized emotes are not supported by all browsers, and FrankerFaceZ does not require emotes to be submitted in this size

member.name: F:TwitchLib.MessageEmote.EmoteSize.Large
member.summary: Large-sized emotes are not supported by all browsers, and FrankerFaceZ does not require emotes to be submitted in this size

member.name: P:TwitchLib.MessageEmote.Id
member.summary: Emote ID as used by the emote source. Will be provided as {0} to be substituted into the indicated URL if needed.

member.name: P:TwitchLib.MessageEmote.Text
member.summary: Emote text which appears in a message and is meant to be replaced by the emote image.

member.name: P:TwitchLib.MessageEmote.Source
member.summary: The specified for this emote.

member.name: P:TwitchLib.MessageEmote.Size
member.summary: The specified for this emote.

member.name: P:TwitchLib.MessageEmote.ReplacementString
member.summary: The string to substitute emote text for.

member.name: P:TwitchLib.MessageEmote.ReplacementDelegate
member.summary: The desired to use for replacing text in a given emote. Default:

member.name: P:TwitchLib.MessageEmote.EscapedText
member.summary: The emote text regex-escaped so that it can be embedded into a regex pattern.

member.summary: Constructor for a new MessageEmote instance.

member.summary: Retrieves the current status of the broadcaster.

member.returns: True if the broadcaster is online, false otherwise.

member.name: M:TwitchLib.TwitchApi.GetChannelHosts(System.String)
member.summary:
Retrieves a string list of channels hosting a specified channel.
Note: This uses an undocumented API endpoint and reliability is not guaranteed. Additionally, this makes 2 API calls so limited use is recommended.
member.param: The name of the channel to search for.
member.returns: A list of all channels that are currently hosting the specified channel.

member.name: M:TwitchLib.TwitchApi.GetTeamMembers(System.String)
member.summary:
Retrieves a TwitchTeamMember list of all members in a Twitch team.
Note: This uses an undocumented API endpoint and reliability is not guaranteed.
member.param: The name of the Twitch team to search for.
member.returns: A TwitchTeamMember list of all members in a Twitch team.

member.name: M:TwitchLib.TwitchApi.GetTwitchChannel(System.String)
member.summary: Retrieves a TwitchStream object containing API data related to a stream.
member.param: The name of the channel to search for.
member.returns: A TwitchStream object containing API data related to a stream.

member.name: M:TwitchLib.TwitchApi.UserFollowsChannel(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Retrieves whether a specified user is following the specified user.
member.param: The user to check the follow status of.
The channel to check against.
member.returns: True if the user is following the channel, false otherwise.

member.name: M:TwitchLib.TwitchApi.GetTwitchFollowers(System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32,TwitchLib.TwitchApi.SortDirection)
member.summary: Retrieves an ascending or descending list of followers from a specific channel.
member.param: The channel to retrieve the followers from.
Maximum number of objects in array. Default is 25. Maximum is 100.

Twitch uses cursoring to paginate long lists of followers. Check _cursor in response body and set cursor to this value to get the next page of results, or use _links.next to navigate to the next page of results.
Creation date sorting direction.
member.returns: A list of TwitchFollower objects.

member.name: M:TwitchLib.TwitchApi.GetUptime(System.String)
member.summary: Retrieves the current uptime of a stream, if it is online.
member.param: The channel to retrieve the uptime for.
member.returns: A TimeSpan object representing time between creation_at of stream, and now.

member.name: M:TwitchLib.TwitchApi.GetTwitchStream(System.String)
member.summary: Retrieves a collection of API data from a stream.
member.param: The channel to retrieve the data for.
member.returns: A TwitchStream object containing API data related to a stream.

member.name: M:TwitchLib.TwitchApi.SearchChannels(System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Execute a search query on Twitch to find a list of channels.
member.param: A url-encoded search query.
Maximum number of objects in array. Default is 25. Maximum is 100.
Object offset for pagination. Default is 0.
member.returns: A list of TwitchChannel objects matching the query.

member.summary: Retrieves a list of all people currently chatting in a channel's chat.

member.name: T:TwitchLib.TwitchChatClient
member.summary: Represents a client connected to a Twitch channel.

member.name: P:TwitchLib.TwitchChatClient.ChannelState
member.summary: Object representing current state of channel (r9k, slow, etc).

member.name: P:TwitchLib.TwitchChatClient.Channel
member.summary: The current channel the TwitcChatClient is connected to.

member.name: P:TwitchLib.TwitchChatClient.TwitchUsername
member.summary: Username of the user connected via this library.

member.name: P:TwitchLib.TwitchChatClient.PreviousMessage
member.summary: The most recent message received.

member.name: P:TwitchLib.TwitchChatClient.IsConnected
member.summary: The current connection status of the client.

member.name: P:TwitchLib.TwitchChatClient.ChannelEmotes
member.summary: The emotes this channel replaces.
member.remarks: Twitch-handled emotes are automatically added to this collection (which also accounts for managing user emote permissions such as sub-only emotes). Third-party emotes will have to be manually added according to the availability rules defined by the third-party.

member.name: P:TwitchLib.TwitchChatClient.WillReplaceEmotes
member.summary: Determines whether Emotes will be replaced in messages.

member.name: E:TwitchLib.TwitchChatClient.OnConnected
member.summary: Fires on listening and after joined channel, returns username and channel.

member.name: E:TwitchLib.TwitchChatClient.OnIncorrectLogin
member.summary: Fires on logging in with incorrect details, returns ErrorLoggingInException.

member.name: E:TwitchLib.TwitchChatClient.OnChannelStateChanged
member.summary: Fires when connecting and channel state is changed, returns ChannelState.

member.name: E:TwitchLib.TwitchChatClient.OnUserStateChanged
member.summary: Fires when a user state is received, returns UserState.

member.name: E:TwitchLib.TwitchChatClient.OnMessageReceived
member.summary: Fires when a new chat message arrives, returns ChatMessage.

member.name: E:TwitchLib.TwitchChatClient.OnMessageSent
member.summary: Fires when a chat message is sent, returns username, channel and message.

member.name: E:TwitchLib.TwitchChatClient.OnCommandReceived
member.summary: Fires when command (uses custom command identifier) is received, returns channel, command, ChatMessage, arguments as string, arguments as list.

member.name: E:TwitchLib.TwitchChatClient.OnViewerJoined
member.summary: Fires when a new viewer/chatter joined the channel's chat room, returns username and channel.

member.name: E:TwitchLib.TwitchChatClient.OnModeratorJoined
member.summary: Fires when a moderator joined the channel's chat room, returns username and channel.

member.name: E:TwitchLib.TwitchChatClient.OnNewSubscriber
member.summary: Fires when new subscriber is announced in chat, returns Subscriber.

member.name: E:TwitchLib.TwitchChatClient.OnReSubscriber
member.summary: Fires when current subscriber renews subscription, returns ReSubscriber.

member.name: E:TwitchLib.TwitchChatClient.OnHostLeft
member.summary: Fires when a hosted streamer goes offline and hosting is killed.

member.name: E:TwitchLib.TwitchChatClient.OnExistingUsersDetected
member.summary: Fires when Twitch notifies client of existing users in chat.

member.name: E:TwitchLib.TwitchChatClient.OnViewerLeft
member.summary: Fires when a PART message is received from Twitch regarding a particular viewer
